rules_text:
Vigilance, menace
[i]Siegfried[/i] – Whenever Xander, Paragon Knight attacks, defending player sacrifices a creature they control. If you are attacking that player with another creature, create a Treasure token.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Xander attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, Xander and that creature gain deathtouch until end of turn.
